title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies: Virtual Reality-Based Surgical Simulation Training Program Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce step-by-step surgical procedure examples in a virtual reality environment with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze complex surgical situations with over 70% accuracy using problem-solving strategies based on task examples.
Learners can enhance surgical teamwork competencies to at least 3.5 points on a 4-point scale through team-based simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
